pkgmetadata.use: Adds support for DRM (Digital Radio Mondiale) broadcasts Adds support for using digital voice modes Adds support for demodulating FreeDV digital voice transmissions Adds support for demodulating M17 digital voice signals Adds support for decoding JS8 Adds support for APRS and packet radio Adds support for the POCSAG protocol Adds support for WSJT-X modes (FT8, FT4, WSPR, JT65, JT9, FST4, FST4W, Q65)
